import { Card, CardHeader, CardContent, Avatar, Divider, Typography, Button, CardActions } from "@material-ui/core" import bankStyle from '../bankStyle' const BanksCard =(props)=>{ const classes = bankStyle() const accounts = props.bank.accounts const bank = props.bank return {bank.name.charAt(0)}} /> { accounts.length>0 ? (
{`Account number: ${accounts[0].account_number}`} {`Account holder name: ${accounts[0].holder_name}`}
) : (
Account is not set yet ):
) } { accounts.length>0 ? : (null) } } export default BanksCard
